text: The JAC Refine S2 is a subcompact Crossover SUV made by JAC Motors since 2015. == History and Features == The JAC Refine S2 was revealed at the Shanghai Auto Show in 2015. and was launched in China in August. its positioned above the JAC Refine S2 Mini and below the JAC Refine S3 it has a 1.5 and 1.6 liter petrol engines with a 5-speed manual or CVT transmissions. It also has a electric version called JAC iEV7S this version has a electric motor of 116 hp and a range of 280 km it was the base vehicle for the Sehol E20X the first ever vehicle from the Sehol brand (previously Sol). == Markets == The JAC Refine S2 is sold mainly in the Chinese market but its also sold in Mexico as the JAC Sei 2 and in Italy France Spain and Bulgaria as the EVO3 the JAC iEV7S is sold in China Brazil as the JAC iEV40 Netherlands. Italy as the EVO 3 Electric. and Switzerland as the JAC e-S2. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: JAC Refine S2
